attributes.action: MPs should not be paid when they are not working
attributes.additional_details:
MPs should not be paid when they are not working.
Self employed people do not get paid if they are not working. Some people get sick pay when they are sick and don't go to work but if you just don't turn up you son't get paid . MP's should be the same. What are there actual terms and conditions. After all we voted them in. When we are not working we can't claim expenses. MPs should not be able too either.MP's ahould be attending debates etc. How many hours do MP's actually do, with long hols etc?
